# GitHub Social Preview Setup

## Recommended Image
- Size: 1280x640 pixels
- Format: PNG or JPG
- Content: Smart Absen logo + tagline

## How to Add
1. Go to repository Settings
2. Scroll to "Social preview"
3. Click "Edit"
4. Upload image (1280x640)
